name: ValuesCo
intro: Web3 technology company that powers rewards ecosystems
introduce: ValuesCo is a Web3 technology company that powers rewards ecosystems. Brands, nonprofits and creators use our tools to inspire action that aligns value with values for the next gen. alues empowers communities to design & launch a social token with no code or blockchain knowledge. Community members create wallets instantaneously with phone/email login and earn tokens by completing actions and submitting proof via photo/social media, scanning QR codes, and more. Tokens are redeemed for rewards like products, experiences, and digital collectibles.
